nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 32 is the thirty-second and final issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars Adventures. It features the stories "The Battle for Horizon Base," by Michael Moreci, and "The Lost Stories, Part 3, by Cavan Scott. The issue was published by IDW Publishing on July 15, 2020.
Learn more about the heroes and villains of The Rise of Skywalker! In this issue, the spotlight falls on Finn!
